Class ReservationMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Menu
      • ReservationMenu

  • public class ReservationMenu
extends Menu
    ReservationMenu is a sub class of Menu class, which handles all the reservation in the hotel.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Li Jin Quan, Lee Jian Hao, Chen Xing Yu, Kok Jia Hui

      static void makeReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList, java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList, java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
      This method creates new Reservation into the system by taking in Guest details from guestList.
      static void printReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
      This method prints all Reservation from reservationList, except for EXPIRED Status.
      static void printReservationMenu()
      This method prints the Reservation Menu to inform the users of the options.
      static void removeReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList, java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
      This method removes Reservation from reservationList.

    • Method Detail

      • reservationMenu

        public static void reservationMenu(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method directs the user to the Reservation Menu.
        Parameters:
        guestList - - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        roomList - - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - - This list contains all the reservations details.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • printReservationMenu

        public static void printReservationMenu()
        This method prints the Reservation Menu to inform the users of the options.

      • makeReservation

        public static void makeReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method creates new Reservation into the system by taking in Guest details from guestList. The room the user desire will be obtained from roomList and successful reservation will be added into the reservationList.
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • searchReservation

        public static void searchReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
        This method search for the reservation in reservationList.
        Parameters:
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.

      • updateReservation

        public static void updateReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
        This method updates Reservation from reservationList. roomList is used to check for available room type that the user desire.
        Parameters:
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.

      • printReservation

        public static void printReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
        This method prints all Reservation from reservationList, except for EXPIRED Status.
        Parameters:
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.

      • removeReservation

        public static void removeReservation(java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
        This method removes Reservation from reservationList. The Status in Room will also be updated accordingly based on the Status in roomList.
        Parameters:
        reservationList - - This list contains all the reservations details.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
